column6: A locked room mystery! A string of brutal murders! A missing girl! One of Peter Parker's closest friends on the brink of ruin! This looks like a job for the Amazing Spider-Sleuth... and all clues point to the sinister SANDMAN! But all of Spidey's classic villains are being reinvented as part of "THE GAUNTLET", and Sandy is no different -- so nothing is what it seems! Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller (cover):Javier Pulido | colorist:Javier Rodriguez | writer:Fred Van Lente | editor:Stephen Wacker
